# Ortogonalidade Conceitual / Conceptual Orthogonality

> Personal blog by Felipe Cotti

## About

This is a bilingual personal blog (Portuguese and English) by Felipe Cotti. The name "Ortogonalidade Conceitual" (Conceptual Orthogonality) refers to the tagline: "Minhas palavras e bom senso. Duas linhas que nunca cruzam." â€” "Words of my own and common sense, two lines never crossing."

## Content

The blog contains:
- Personal thoughts and reflections
- Technical articles
- General musings and opinions

## Languages

- Primary language: Portuguese (pt-BR)
- Secondary language: English (en-US)
- English content is available at `/en/` paths

## Author

Felipe Cotti
- Website: https://blog.cotti.com.br/
- GitHub: https://github.com/cotti
- Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/cotti.com.br
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/felipecotti
- Mastodon: https://masto.donte.com.br/@cotti

## Usage Guidelines

Feel free to reference and cite content from this blog. When doing so, please attribute the source appropriately.
